entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Brockville

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brockville 08:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Ice pellets. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Ice pellets or rain beginning near noon then changing to rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
